item.title: Dell PowerEdge T150 Memory
item.description: TLDR; buy this -> Kingston Server Premier 32GB 2933MHz Memory Why As of 2022-04-10, 128GB of ram from dell.com will cost you $2,540.28 USD. This is more than you need to spend for certified ram, but don’t rush to buy what you think might be compatible. Dell claims the T150 supports 128gb of memory, and 3200mhz memory, just not together. NOTE 32 GB x 4 supports 2933 MT/s. I tried 2 different Nemix types, 3200mhz and 2933mhz but they only worked up to 96GB (maybe because of slow CL?
